Steps to reproduce:
1) Go to Window>Preferences>Team>CVS>Console
2) Uncheck the Limit console output option
3) Without applying the change, also go to:
Window>Preferences>Team>CVS and change the settins for Quietness level.
4)  Then apply and click OK.
5) When clicking on OK, I get the exception.

100% reproducable.
Fixed the code in Team, but the spec for IOConsole.setWaterMarks

traces.message: High water mark must be greater than low water mark
